import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

source.3cef3143:
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 10))
channels = df.query('Category == "Comedy"')
subs = list(channels['Subscribers'])
names = list(channels['Channel'])
plt.pie(subs, labels=names, autopct='%1.1f%%', colors=['#c4ff75', '#baff9e', '#ff9c59'])
plt.show()
source.d6fa5f8d:
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 10))
channels = df.query('Category == "Music"')
subs = list(channels['Subscribers'].head(10))
names = list(channels['Channel'].head(10))
colors = ['#baff9e', '#ff9c59', '#85dae6', '#e6859c', '#e69585', '#c1e685', '#87e685', '#e685dc', '#edabcc', '#c8e8c5']
plt.pie(subs, labels=names, autopct='%1.1f%%', colors=colors)
plt.show()
